docs.text: reflecting on " bedazzled , " a lively comedy about the devil who seeks to possess the soul of a pathetic loser , one sinful thought remains in my mind .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if hell means having to spend an eternity with elizabeth hurley ( who portrays the fiery demon ) , then use that pitchfork and point me the way .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with her pouty lips , irresistible british accent , and wild display of haute couture , hurley crackles with naughtiness and fills your mind with temptation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's practically impossible to turn this beelzu-babe down .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her next target is elliot ( brendan fraser ) , a tech support geek who is clumsy , awkward , and just too eager to please .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: to aptly picture him , you would have to remember a saturday night live skit featuring " steve the copy guy " who effortlessly irritated his co-workers with his unpolished social skills .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: eugene , thus , is loathed and feared by his co-workers , who do their best to stay out of his way .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet , beyond his annoying mannerisms , he's a lovable oaf .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he wishes that he could get closer to allison ( frances o'connor ) , a co-worker with whom he is infatuated but who has never taken notice of him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , the odds of him getting together with her are about the same as a snowball's chance in hell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " dear god , " he prays .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " i would give anything to have that girl in my life . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: guess who then shows up ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she makes an offer that is too hard to refuse .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " seven utterly fabulous wishes for one piddling little soul . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's even an escape clause .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if elliot's wish doesn't go exactly the way he likes , he need only 'beep' her ( one guess as to what the three-digit number is ) and he gets to start over .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the remainder of the film consists of elliot's various fantasies that incorporate his personal desire to have enormous amounts of wealth , power , fame and allison's love .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but when he makes sweeping statements such as " i want to be very , very powerful and very , very rich and married to allison " , he'll soon learn that the devil is in the details .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for example , ( and we've seen this several times in the trailers ) , he is granted his wish , but finds out that he's a columbian drug lord and that allison , while married to him , has her eyes on someone else .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: apparently , the devil is just as eager to skew his fantasies as she is to possess his soul .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his other wishes also end up with some strange but funny twist that short-circuits his new life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: soon , elliot wishes that he had never made that deal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: given the mischievous nature of the devil , " bedazzled " has many amusing moments .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a lot of the credit goes to fraser who turns in a great comic performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he ably assumes various personas .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his funniest segment is when he wishes that he could be the most sensitive man in the world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: allison becomes so frustrated with him that she practically urges him to take advantage of her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hurley also heightens the humor quotient , especially in the transitional scenes when fraser waits to start his next wish after bailing out of the previous one .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's clear that she's having a good time with it all .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet , while the filmmakers work hard at creating funny scenes , they conspicuously avoid developing the allegorical underpinnings between good and evil that could have added more heft to this story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but that would be playing with fire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what they've got works , so you can easily accept it for the pleasant little comedy that it is .
docs.label: positive
